mapper.select: select supplier_commodity_image, commoditytype_id, supplier_commodity_onprice, supplier_commodity_id, supplier_id, supplier_commodity_name from supplier_commodity;

select supplier_commodity_image, commoditytype_id, supplier_commodity_onprice, supplier_commodity_id, supplier_id, supplier_commodity_name from supplier_commodity where supplier_commodity_id = #{supplierCommodityId};

select supplier_commodity_image,commoditytype_id,supplier_commodity_onprice,supplier_commodity_id,supplier_id,supplier_commodity_name from supplier_commodity
and supplier_commodity_name like concat('%',#{suppliercommodity.supplierCommodityName},'%')
and commoditytype_id = #{tid}
ORDER BY commoditytype_id
mapper.insert: insert into supplier_commodity (supplier_commodity_id, supplier_commodity_name, supplier_commodity_onprice, supplier_commodity_image) values (#{supplierCommodityId}, #{supplierCommodityName}, #{supplierCommodityOnprice}, #{supplierCommodityImage});
mapper.select: select * from supplier_commodity where supplier_commodity_id in (select supplier_commodity_id from purchaseorder_details where purchaseorder_id = #{pid})
select count(1) from supplier_commodity where supplier_commodity_id in (select supplier_commodity_id from purchaseorder_details where purchaseorder_id = #{pid});
